author: szabyg
msg: Updating the annotate.js widget. For details see https://github.com/szabyg/annotate.js

author: markt
msg: Use context error pages where possible e.g. for authenticator errors

author: markt
msg: Fix a regression with the fix for 51653 that broke custom error page handling for error status codes return by the authenticators.

This moves error page handling back to the host valve and also moves request listener handling to the host valve. This ensures that everything at a context level happens inside the listeners and that custom error pages are available for all context errors.
